name: Knit Story
description:
You play as a small toy: lost, confused, and fighting to make its way back home. Collect yarn, create platforms, and defeat invading ants to get there!  Controls:

Movement: WASD 

Jump: Space

Create ball: E

Create platform: R

Throw ball/ place platform: F

Group members:

Fahad Edward: Programmer

Ashton Wilks: 3D Modeler +  Rigger

Tahsin Rahman: Game UI + Illustrations

Jonathan Singh: Programmer

Bartu Gurel: 3D Animation

SeungMin Jun: Map Creator
